name: 1000m Under Uncle Bill's Island
description:
Made for Buddy Up Jam (Spring 2022)

You're stuck on an island with nothing but a fishing rod and a man named "Bill." Find your way out, or in, or something.

Controls:

  1. Left click to throw the bobber.
  2. Right click to lift it. If it's touching a fish, the fish will be thrown into the air.
  3. Once a fish is in the air, your gun will be retrieved automatically. Left click to shoot the fish while it's there.

Credits:

Tools: Programming, Art

Dennis: Modeling
